item.title: About Ursa Labs
item.description: Founded in 2018, Ursa Labs is an industry-funded development group specializing in open source data science tools. It is dedicated to advancing the start of the art in high-productivity, high-performance, cross-language software for data scientists. Learn more about our technology vision and roadmap. Leadership Wes McKinney Director Wes created the pandas project in 2008 and wrote the book Python for Data Analysis, helping popularize the use of Python for data science.

item.title: Supporting Ursa Labs
item.description: Thank you for your interest in Ursa Labs. We depend on external financial support to provide a livelihood for software engineers creating open source software for the public good. We are looking to build relationships with organizations which can provide either: Direct financial support, which will be used to provide salary and benefits for software engineers working in the lab Engineering collaborations on our roadmap To contact us about ways to support Ursa Labs, please email us at info@ursalabs.

item.title: Ursa Labs Technology
item.description: Apache Arrow Development Platform Storage Interfaces Data Access Shared Memory and IPC Arrow-native Computation Engine Subgraph Compiler / Code-generation Python Support R Support JavaScript Support Builds, CI, Packaging Performance and Benchmarking The Ursa Labs team has been creating popular open source data science tools for over a decade. One of our goals is to empower and accelerate the work of data scientists through more efficient and scalable in-memory computing.
